text: :  . ,  . Vacancy announcement! Position: Sales manager (conversion agent). Were looking for: English level: Intermediate or higher. Experienced in this field 3 month. A result-oriented person. Good communicational skill. A team-player. Skilled to work with PC and CRM system. VERY IMPORTANT: IM LACKING FOR EMLOYEERS WHO WONT SIT ON THE BASIC SALARY! What we offer: Great basic salary (up to 850$). Very high % in bonuses structure. HOT traffic. European leads (without Asia, Malaysia, Philippine, South Africa). Comfortable office at metro Livoberezhna. Fix schedule: 5/2.10am - 7pm. Official employment (by your request). Coffee, tea, cookies. Lunch  coffee-breaks. Career growth (team leaders, retention agents). C1    Sales ManagementTeambuildingFluent English. Leadership SkillsMotivationForexFinancial MarketsTeamplayer.

{"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::614b6b81f578273cc1f1b429::headhunter_ua", "source": "headhunter_ua", "country": "UA", "company": "Інокс Компані", "position": "Sales Manager (English desk)", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: не требуется

Полная занятость, полный день

Vacancy announcement!

Position: Sales manager (conversion agent)

We’re looking for:

  • English level: Intermediate or higher.
  • Experienced in this field 3+ month.
  • A result-oriented person.
  • Good communicational skill.
  • A team-player
  • Skilled to work with PC and CRM system.

VERY IMPORTANT: I’M LACKING FOR EMLOYEERS WHO WON’T SIT ON THE BASIC SALARY!

What we offer:

  • Great basic salary (up to 850$).
  • Very high % in bonuses structure.
  • HOT traffic.
  • European leads (without Asia, Malaysia, Philippine, South Africa).
  • Comfortable office at metro Livoberezhna.
  • Fix schedule: 5/2; 10am - 7pm.
  • Official employment (by your request).
  • Coffee, tea, cookies.
  • Lunch + coffee-breaks.
  • Career growth (team leaders, retention agents).

Ключевые навыки

Английский — C1 — Продвинутый
Работа в команде
Sales Management
Teambuilding
Fluent English
Leadership Skills
Motivation
Forex
Financial Markets
Teamplayer
